main event: A UFO was observed at Whiteman AFB, Missouri on May 5, 1963, believed to be a balloon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 6 minutes,The object was described as circular and white or light orange,Three tower operators observed the UFO and reported good reliability,Colonel W.E. Byerts and Lt. Robert Bowers flying a T-33 were notified of the sighting and confirmed the description,The reliability of the observers was considered good to excellent.
